name: epic-development.com
description: Website based on express and Vue.js for Nude Artist Management.

scripts.dev-build: npm run copy & watchify -vd -p [ parcelify -wo build/bundle.css ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t stringify -t vueify -t [ browserify-css --autoInject=true --minify=true --rebaseUrls=true ] -e client/main.js -o build/build.js & nodemon server/app.js
scripts.prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run copy-prod && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o build/prod/build.js -- build/build.js
scripts.build-website-container: docker build -t eu.gcr.io/cluster-01-1252/epic-development:latest -t eu.gcr.io/cluster-01-1252/epic-development:$TAG -f cluster/container/Dockerfile-Website . && gcloud docker push eu.gcr.io/cluster-01-1252/epic-development:latest && gcloud docker push eu.gcr.io/cluster-01-1252/epic-development:$TAG

author: Robert Jefe Lindstaedt <robert.lindstaedt@gmail.com>
